items.title: Teams
body: Create a team

REQ_DEF:{"path":"test\\DataController.cs","lines":"26-47","title":"Create a team","route":"/api/v1.0/teams","method":"POST","headers":{"Content-Type":"application/json","Authorization":"Bearer XXX"},"body":[{"attr":"ApproveDenyComment","type":"string","desc":"A reason for the approval of the request","optional":false},{"attr":"AppliedPolicy","type":"number","desc":"Optional","optional":false}]}
Use this endpoint to create a team
Update metadata of a team

REQ_DEF:{"path":"test\\DataController.cs","lines":"194-228","title":"Update metadata of a team","route":"/api/v1.0/teams/{teamId}/metadata","method":"PATCH","headers":{"Content-Type":"application/json","Authorization":"Bearer XXX"},"body":[{"attr":"FieldId","type":"number","desc":"The id of the field","optional":false},{"attr":"Value","type":"string","desc":"The value of the vield","optional":false}],"rsp_body":{"TeamId":{"type":"string","desc":"123-456789-1011121314"},"TeamUrl":{"type":"string","desc":"asdf"},"MembersCount":{"type":"int","desc":"43"},"SharePointUrl":{"type":"string","desc":"asdf"},"IconUrl":{"type":"string","desc":"asdf"},"DisplayName":{"type":"string","desc":"@My Cool Team"},"MailNickname":{"type":"string","desc":"My_Cool_Team"},"Description":{"type":"string","desc":"This is my super cool Team"},"Visibility":{"type":"string","desc":"public"},"CreatedAt":{"type":"datetime","desc":"2023-17-01:10:55:00"}}}
Use this endpoint to update one or more field values of a given team
Get managed Teams

REQ_DEF:{"path":"test\\DataController.cs","lines":"254-283","title":"Get managed Teams","route":"/api/v1.0/teams/{teamId}/metadata","method":"GET","headers":{"Content-Type":"application/json","Authorization":"Bearer XXX"},"rsp_body":{"TeamId":{"type":"string","desc":"123-456789-1011121314"},"TeamUrl":{"type":"string","desc":"asdf"},"MembersCount":{"type":"int","desc":"43"},"SharePointUrl":{"type":"string","desc":"asdf"},"IconUrl":{"type":"string","desc":"asdf"},"DisplayName":{"type":"string","desc":"@My Cool Team"},"MailNickname":{"type":"string","desc":"My_Cool_Team"},"Description":{"type":"string","desc":"This is my super cool Team"},"Visibility":{"type":"string","desc":"public"},"CreatedAt":{"type":"datetime","desc":"2023-17-01:10:55:00"}}}
Use this endpoint to retrieve a list of all field values of a given teams
Get managed Teams

REQ_DEF:{"path":"test\\DataController.cs","lines":"302-331","title":"Get managed Teams","route":"/api/v1.0/teams/managed","method":"GET","headers":{"Content-Type":"application/json","Authorization":"Bearer XXX"},"rsp_body":{"TeamId":{"type":"string","desc":"123-456789-1011121314"},"TeamUrl":{"type":"string","desc":"asdf"},"MembersCount":{"type":"int","desc":"43"},"SharePointUrl":{"type":"string","desc":"asdf"},"IconUrl":{"type":"string","desc":"asdf"},"DisplayName":{"type":"string","desc":"@My Cool Team"},"MailNickname":{"type":"string","desc":"My_Cool_Team"},"Description":{"type":"string","desc":"This is my super cool Team"},"Visibility":{"type":"string","desc":"public"},"CreatedAt":{"type":"datetime","desc":"2023-17-01:10:55:00"}}}
Use this endpoint to retrieve a list of all managed teams that you are a member of
Get managed Teams

REQ_DEF:{"path":"test\\DataController.cs","lines":"347-376","title":"Get managed Teams","route":"/api/v1.0/teams/managed/all","method":"GET","headers":{"Content-Type":"application/json","Authorization":"Bearer XXX"},"rsp_body":{"TeamId":{"type":"string","desc":"123-456789-1011121314"},"TeamUrl":{"type":"string","desc":"asdf"},"MembersCount":{"type":"int","desc":"43"},"SharePointUrl":{"type":"string","desc":"asdf"},"IconUrl":{"type":"string","desc":"asdf"},"DisplayName":{"type":"string","desc":"@My Cool Team"},"MailNickname":{"type":"string","desc":"My_Cool_Team"},"Description":{"type":"string","desc":"This is my super cool Team"},"Visibility":{"type":"string","desc":"public"},"CreatedAt":{"type":"datetime","desc":"2023-17-01:10:55:00"}}}
Use this endpoint to retrieve a list of all managed teams
Get archived teams

REQ_DEF:{"path":"test\\DataController.cs","lines":"400-429","title":"Get archived teams","route":"/api/v1.0/teams/archived","method":"GET","headers":{"Content-Type":"application/json","Authorization":"Bearer XXX"},"rsp_body":{"TeamId":{"type":"string","desc":"123-456789-1011121314"},"TeamUrl":{"type":"string","desc":"asdf"},"MembersCount":{"type":"int","desc":"43"},"SharePointUrl":{"type":"string","desc":"asdf"},"IconUrl":{"type":"string","desc":"asdf"},"DisplayName":{"type":"string","desc":"@My Cool Team"},"MailNickname":{"type":"string","desc":"My_Cool_Team"},"Description":{"type":"string","desc":"This is my super cool Team"},"Visibility":{"type":"string","desc":"public"},"CreatedAt":{"type":"datetime","desc":"2023-17-01:10:55:00"}}}
Use this endpoint to retrieve a list of all archived teams

items.title: Templates
body: Save a template

body: Get managed Teams

items.title: Metadata
body: Get metadata fields

REQ_DEF:{"path":"test\\DataController.cs","lines":"445-472","title":"Get metadata fields","route":"/api/v1.0/metadata/fields","method":"GET","headers":{"Content-Type":"application/json","Authorization":"Bearer XXX"},"rsp_status":{"200":"OK"},"rsp_body":{"name":{"type":"string","desc":"CoolField"},"id":{"type":"number","desc":"25"}}}
